backend/main.mo: Motoko actor defining the quiz backend with Question and Result types, a hardcoded question bank grouped by topic, and a results map with an incrementing ID for storing participant quiz scores.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping a single rebuild/redeploy feature to its relevant frontend files, UI components, and test ID REQ-16.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: JSON document containing one-sentence summaries for each frontend source file, serving as a reference index for the project's frontend structure.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base stylesheet defining OKLCH CSS custom properties for light and dark color themes including background, foreground, primary, chart, and sidebar tokens.
frontend/index.html: Minimal HTML entry point titled 'Kuiz Interaktif Refleksologi' that mounts the React app into a root div via the main.tsx module script.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React component that configures TanStack Router with three routes: home (/), quiz (/quiz), and admin (/admin), each mapped to their respective page components.
Form component that collects a participant's full name and date with validation, enabling the start button only when both fields are filled.
frontend/src/components/QuestionCard.tsx: Displays a single quiz question with four labeled answer options, applying correct/incorrect visual styles after selection and toggling an explanation panel.
frontend/src/components/QuizSummary.tsx: Results summary component showing participant info, star rating, score percentage, performance label with message, and a per-question answer breakdown table.
frontend/src/components/TopicSelector.ts: Renders a grid of selectable topic cards plus a 'Full Quiz' card, each showing question counts and styled with gradient colors. Calls `onSelect` with the chosen topic or null for the full quiz.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Custom hook that creates and caches an ICP backend actor (authenticated or anonymous) using React Query, and invalidates dependent queries whenever the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides an `InternetIdentityProvider` context and `useInternetIdentity` hook for managing Internet Identity authentication, including login, logout, and persisted identity state via AuthClient.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Exports three React Query hooks—`useAllQuestions`, `useQuestionsByTopic`, and `useResults`—that fetch data from the ICP backend actor with caching.
frontend/src/index.css: Global stylesheet that imports fonts, defines Tailwind CSS layers with a warm OKLCH-based design token palette (light and dark modes), custom utility classes for quiz answer states, and print styles.
frontend/src/lib/utils.ts: Exports a `cn` utility function that merges Tailwind CSS class names using `clsx` and `tailwind-merge`.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that mounts the React app with `QueryClientProvider` and `InternetIdentityProvider` wrapping the root `App` component.
frontend/src/pages/AdminPage.tsx: Admin page displaying a ranked leaderboard table of quiz results with rank icons, performance badges, and a printable per-participant result card component.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Home page featuring a hero banner, topic selector grid, and navigation to the quiz route; fetches all questions to derive available topics and their counts.
frontend/src/pages/QuizPage.tsx: Main quiz page component that handles participant info collection, shuffles and displays questions one at a time, tracks answers, calculates scores, submits results to the backend actor, and renders summary on completion with restart capability.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration defining dark mode, custom fonts, OKLCH-based color tokens, border radii, box shadows, and keyframe animations for the frontend design system.
project_state.json: Project state metadata file tracking version, feature list, architectural notes, and known issues for a reflexology quiz web application with MCQ questions, topic categories, scoring, and an admin leaderboard.
